title: I want to try a new rengar build

replies.body: No to the rage blade because you have one ap scaling which isnt your main source of damage. No to the BOTRK because you have high ad scalings from your Q and E and your meant to be bursting squishes not tanks(so the percentage damage from it is not put to use). The triforce is also a no because you can only proc the spellblade passive once when bursting down a squishy(since it has a 2 second cooldown and they should be dead before that). Spirit visage no because if you need magic resist you get a maw of the malmortius, which gives you ad, magic resist and a shield which will save you countless times, and it has a really good build path. Beserkers no because you get attack speed from your q, and your a spell based champion not purely an auto attacker. Here is a standard build for one shotting carries. {{item:3074}} {{item:3158}}  {{item:3142}} {{item:3035}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3031}}. If you want a more tanky but still high damage build(which you can still eliminate carries with if they have no defensive items, but it wont be a one shot, it will take a few rotations of your spells. {{item:3074}} {{item:3047}} or {{item:3111}} (depends on who you are against and who is fed) {{item:3071}} {{item:3035}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3143}} . If you want to go tank dps rengar(good if you need to fight their tanks/bruisers). {{item:3153}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3078}}  {{item:3143}} {{item:3026}} .
Looking at your match history can I suggest you actually try the CDR boots - your ult will be up significantly more often for more pick opportunities.
I have 20% CDR from my runes and masteries already, giving me more freedom to buy other shit
Why are you all looking at my match history 0.o?

Sustain fighter with one tank item?

And pop goes the rengar.

I see that you seem to build this every game, You should try swapping it up a little. Maybe swap out that BT for a LW and PD for Triforce. This gives you a tankier rengar that can still oneshot and can also deal damage to tanks quite easily. Or if you're ahead enough you should go Ravenous, Youmuu's and then build a defensive item, Allowing you to be tanky yet still have that one shot capability.
What I meant by new is that the functionality was intended to be different
I mean it works, i don't see why you would run it though.
